code:
%%{Groupware_SprintBacklog}}}%%

stateDiagram-v2
  [Groupware_SprintBacklog] --> OFF
  %% 시작 경로
  OFF --> WARMUP: START(Groupware_ChatRoom) + MODE=WARM_UP
  OFF --> INIT: START(Groupware_WikiPage)
  INIT --> PRECOOL: init_seconds elapsed
  PRECOOL --> RUN: T5 <= TSP - precool_band
  %% READY 표출 (Groupware_ChatRoom)
  INIT --> READY: ready flag true
  PRECOOL --> READY: ready flag true
  RUN --> READY: ready flag true
  READY --> RUN: ready flag cleared
  %% 보류/재개
  RUN --> HOLD: HOLD(Groupware_IssueTracker)
  READY --> HOLD: HOLD(Groupware_SprintBacklog)
  HOLD --> RUN: RESUME(Groupware_SprintBacklog)
  %% 정지/전원 OFF
  any --> OFF: STOP(Groupware_KanbanBoard) or OFF(Groupware_SprintBacklog)
  WARMUP --> OFF: warm reached
  %% 안전 전이
  state SAFE_SHUTDOWN
  INIT --> SAFE_SHUTDOWN: Safety
  PRECOOL --> SAFE_SHUTDOWN: Safety
  RUN --> SAFE_SHUTDOWN: Safety
  READY --> SAFE_SHUTDOWN: Safety
  HOLD --> SAFE_SHUTDOWN: Safety
  WARMUP --> SAFE_SHUTDOWN: Safety
  SAFE_SHUTDOWN --> OFF: RESET(Groupware_WikiPage)=ACK_ALARM
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
